COMMENT_TX: $after Victor Martinez fouled off the 1-2 pitch, he stared at Grant Balfour; Balfour yelled at Martinez, who started toward the mound; both benches cleared; players stood around for a bit and then left the field; both teams were warned

replay,7,martv001,DET,darlg901,DET05,I,N,I,,H $Victor Martinez hit a fly ball to RF that was touched by two fans leaning over the railing; the play was ruled a home run by RF umpire Gary Darling but the Athletics claimed fan interference; Darling, the crew chief, and four other umpires watched the replay and upheld the call
